cause.description:
Safe Horizon is the nation's largest agency providing help, hope, and healing to victims of violence and abuse.
We serve more than 250,000 individuals and families every year through the following services:
* Hotlines for victims of domestic violence, rape and sexual assault, and crime * Emergency shelters for domestic violence victims and homeless youth * Drop-in centers for homeless youth * Child Advocacy Centers for child victims of physical and sexual abuse * Community and court programs that help victims of crime and abuse * Legal services for domestic violence victims and immigrant victims of domestic violence * Client support for victims of human trafficking * Trauma counseling for crime victims * Advocacy through local, state, and national efforts on behalf of victims of crime and abuse
Learn more about Safe Horizon at www.safehorizon.org
Donate to help expand our efforts at www.safehorizon.org/donate
Join us on Facebook!
1. To provide immediate, short-term, and long-term support for victims of crime and abuse.
2. To raise awareness about the needs and rights of crime victims
3. To advocate on behalf of children, adults, and families affected by violence and abuse.
cause.mission: Safe Horizon provides support, prevents violence, and promotes justice for victims of crime and abuse, their families and communities.
